core.name: Thuban - Circumpolar Star
core.description: (Test V2) Team Combo/Charge Total DMG +34%. When non-mech types are in the team, team Fire DMG +40%

subskills.name: Thuban - Circumpolar Star
subskills.description: (Test V2) Team Combo/Charge Total DMG +34%. When non-mech types are in the team, team Fire DMG +40%

core.name: Coma - Stargazing
core.description:
(Test V2)
At 600 meter, hold ATK to use Charged ATK
Activates Astral Harness mode. Summons [Holy Blade Tornado] to deal 12x20% + 200% ATK Fire DMG

When there is a [Holy Blade Tornado], hold ATK button to release [Starfire Retrieval], deal 4x30% ATK Fire DMG and swings a [Holy Blade Tornado] to deal 12x30% ATK Fire DMG

When there are an [Enhanced Holy Blade Tornado], hold ATK button to release [Blooming Starfire], pulling enemies in a big aoe, deal 4x20% ATK Fire DMG and stabs forward to deal 1500% ATK Fire DMG. Ends Astrall Harness and empties out the meter.

subskills.name: Coma Eta
subskills.description: (Test V2) During Astral Harness, Total DMG +40%, anti-interrupt increased and reduce dmg taken by 40% Total DMG.

subskills.name: Coma Gamma
subskills.description: (Test V2) Restore 10sp when using Charged ATK Blooming Starfire.

core.name: Eridanus - Flow of Time
core.description:
(Test V2)
In normal form, recover 20 star meter per second, max 600.
In Astral Harness mode, consumes 100 star meter per second until meter is 0 or until Harness ends off-field (kinda vague, but it does drain off-field).
In Astral Harness mode, Charged ATK summons [Holy Blade Tornado] in an area and [Brilliant Star Formation] forms around the circle. Max 2 tornado can exist at once. When SPA exits, Tornado and Star Formation disappears.

subskills.name: Durandal's Blessing
subskills.description: (Test V2) Enemies within [Brilliant Star Formation] receive 20% more Fire DMG from SPA. (independent bonus)

subskills.name: Eridanus α
subskills.description: (Test V2) In normal form, when 4th Basic ATK hits, restore 80 meter.

subskills.name: Eridanus β
subskills.description: (Test V2) Fire DMG +80%. SPA attacks against ignited enemies gain Fire DMG +20%.

core.name: Pisces - Sun and Moon
core.description:
(Test V2)

SPA instantly gets 200 meter and enter Astral Harness, gathering mimic durandal blade to form [Holy Blade Tornado] to deal a total of 1500% + 12x20% ATK Fire DMG. Pauses timer.
After ult ends, summons [Enhanced Holy Blade Tornado].
[100 sp, 20s CD]

subskills.name: Pisces Eta
subskills.description: (Test V2) When entering Astral Harness state, triggers 2s Time Fracture.

subskills.name: Pisces Gamma
subskills.description: (Test V2) Enemies hit by [Holy Blade Tornado] are ignited. Every 0.5s, inflict 30% ATK Fire DMG, lasts for 8s.

core.name: Andromeda - Nebula Song
core.description:
(Test V2)
Evasion skill: Trigger 3s Time Fracture. If there is an ignited enemy near [Brilliant Star Formation], recover 200 HP. CD: 15s
Press Basic ATK after evasion to connect to Basic ATK 3rd sequence.

subskills.name: Andromeda α
subskills.description: (Test V2) When evasion skill is triggered, valk Total DMG +15% for 3s and restore extra 5 sp.

subskills.name: Andromeda β
subskills.description: (Test V2) On switch in, restore 150 star meter. CD:10s

core.name: Canis - Sirius Shine
core.description:
(Test V2)
ATK Sequence all fire damage, recover star meter
DMG: 80% > 40%+100% > 40%+100% > 3x60% + 250%
Meter recovery: 10 > 5+15 > 10+15 > 3x5+20

In Astral Harness mode, 100% and apply 1 Starfire > 60%+100% and apply 1 Starfire > 40%+150% and apply 2 Starfire > 4x20% + 250% > 500% + 800%

Starfire = 100% ATK Fire DMG

subskills.name: Canis α
subskills.description: (Test V2) Starfire deal additional 150% ATK Fire DMG.

subskills.name: Canis ε
subskills.description: (Test V2) In Astral Harness, 4th Basic ATK ignites enemy, every 0.5s they take 30% ATK Fire DMG. Lasts for 8s.

subskills.name: QTE: Canis δ
subskills.description: (Test V2) QTE: Triggered when an enemy is ignited or knocked airborne, trigger 3s Time Fracture, deal 5x250% ATK Fire DMG, restore 5 SP.
